phrs.translation: 一杯的容量, 一杯, 一满杯, 一玻璃杯

sentences.sentence: I did not drink a glassful, "he said."
Seeingit, he poured out and drank another glassful.
sentences.translation: 看明白了这一点，他又倒了一杯酒灌下去。
